name: microwave2 (3/10)
description:
it's so hard to find a good microwave. they require SO MANY button presses to do anything, and they beep too much, and the buttons themselves are worse than the worst laptop keys... microwave design is not where I would like it to be. 

So, I designed my own microwave! That's it, there's not much of a game here, just an interactive simulation of Microwave 2

controls:
* mouse: interact (can drag too)

made for day 3 of https://itch.io/jam/vmj2020, following this theme:

partially inspired by this tweet: https://twitter.com/leyawn/status/1122221689855672326?s=20
